basic.description: A laboratory-based course providing an advanced survey of state-of-the-art methodologies.  This course is designed to give the student experience in cellular, molecular and whole tissue techniques with applications to digestive and related sciences. Fall term; 2 hours seminar / 4 hours laboratory on alternate weeks. R.J. MacLeod.  Not offered 2010-2011.
basic.subject: PHGY
basic.title: Digestive Sciences I
